description: This file defines a React component named ExportPdfButton, which acts as a helper button to trigger PDF export of a specified DOM element or selector. It incorporates functions exported from '../utils/exportPdf' to perform the export operations and handles user interaction via a button element.

methods.name: onClick
methods.description: Event handler for the button click that invokes PDF export functions based on provided props, handles success or failure, and calls the onExport callback.
